`verify [-w] file1 [file2] [...]`


== Description ==

Verify files specified against stored sha256 and md5 hashes stored in extended attributes.

== Required Files ==

 * stat - base
    NetBSD-like stat, which supports -f "%HT"
 * md5 - base
    FreeBSD-style md5 or linux md5sum (must support -q option)
 * sha256 - base
    FreeBSD-style sha256 (must support -q option)
